content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Describe how the scenario illustrates the power of the purse. Explain how the Unfunded Mandate Reform Act affects the relationship between the states and the federal government. Explain an advantage of using an unfunded mandate to administer the Americans with Disabilities Act. Describe the constitutional amendment that most supports the power of state governments in this situation, and explain how it relates to the scenario.
